name: get shift
script:
# Fetch the shift assignment for the given employee and attendance date
shift = frappe.db.get_all(
    "Shift Assignment",
    filters={
        "employee": doc.employee,
        "docstatus": 1,
        "start_date": ["<=", doc.attendance_date],
        "end_date": [">=", doc.attendance_date]
    },
    fields=["shift_type"]
)

# If the document does not have a shift assigned yet and a shift assignment is found, assign the shift type
if not doc.shift and shift:
    doc.shift = shift[0].shift_type
